questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

discussion.content:
2. No - https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/field-service/create-work-order 
A work order is often created from a case, an agreement, or an opportunity. It gets scheduled either manually, with the schedule assistant, or the Resource Scheduling Optimization add-in.

3. Yes https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/field-service/mobile-power-app-push-notifications
Push notifications can be used to:
-Notify technicians they have been assigned a booking.
-Remind technicians to enter important business data.

comments.content:
I understand your point but even though that can be changed it displays resources first. The same article says this: 

Preferred
The schedule assistant displays preferred resources FIRST in the Gantt view if they match all other requirements and filters. It also shows a heart icon next to their name.

I'm getting confused by this statement but it also says that they need to match all other requirements so its not preference over requirements >.<

discussion.content:
Schedule Assistance *can* use preferred resources for a specific requirement. But that's optional. So should be No.
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dynamics365/field-service/resource-preferences

Given answers are correct!
Pending job > Work order
Diagnose > Inspect / Inspection
